name: Ferguson Enterprises, Inc.
summary: Ferguson Enterprises, Inc. is the largest value-added distributor of plumbing, HVAC, appliances, lighting, and related products in North America, serving professional contractors and specialized trades. Headquartered in Newport News, Virginia, Ferguson operates nearly 1,800 locations with approximately 35,000 employees and reported $29.6 billion in revenue for fiscal year 2024. The company debuted at #146 on the 2025 Fortune 500 and is publicly traded on the NYSE and LSE under the ticker FERG.
